questions.question: “Suddenly I remembered Bruno.” Who is Bruno?

choices.answer: A greedy boy who has been turned into a mouse.

questions.question: The narrator was surprised because when he spoke...

choices.answer: No sound came out of his mouth.

questions.question: How did the narrator feel about being a mouse?

choices.answer: He was worried his grandma would not love him.

questions.question: What was Bruno doing when the narrator finally found him?

choices.answer: He was trying to think of a plan to become a human again.
He was nibbling a piece of bread.
He was worried about his parents’ reaction.
He was playing with the narrator’s white mice.

questions.question: How did Bruno think his parents were going to react when they realized that Bruno had been turned into a mouse?

choices.answer: His father would be upset AND his mother terrified.
His father would be furious BUT his mother would be thrilled.

questions.question: What do the narrator and Bruno decide to do?

choices.answer: Look for The Grand High Witch and take revenge.
Look for Mary and William and set up a White Mouse Circus.
